stories.headline: Four decades since Crocodile Dundee, NT films ride new wave of popularity
stories.first_sentence: Kangaroo, filmed in Alice Springs, is making waves globally and became Germany's highest grossing Australian film in 25 years.

stories.headline: Australia news live: Hume says opposition would resist any CGT increase; high-profile Liberal quits party saying there are ‘other ways I can support women’
stories.first_sentence: Hume is asked about specifics of the Liberals’' policies going forward, but isn’t offering much detail, saying she “won’t go into the intricacies of policies just after the change”.

stories.headline: Bangladesh's first fair vote in years comes with a daunting to-do list
stories.first_sentence: A landmark election in Bangladesh ended years of disputed polls, and now the winners face pressure to tackle corruption and a battered economy.
